row.name: JOBS.WIN.IIS.PARAM.ADD_BINDING_TO_SITE_SERVER_1_DMZ
row.description: param job for Action PACK - SERVER 1

row.process:
! !BINDING pour la 1ere machine ! :SET &AGENT# = &HOST_SHAREPOINT_1# :PUBLISH &AGENT#,,"WORKFLOW" :SET &LOGIN# = 'LOGIN.DEFAUT' :PUBLISH &LOGIN#,,"WORKFLOW" ! !:SET &UC4RB_IIS_SITE_NAME# = GET_VAR(&VARA_NAME_STATIC#,"IIS_WEBAPP_SITENAME_EXT_&ENVIRONNEMENT##") :PSET &UC4RB_IIS_SITE_NAME# = "&IIS_WEBAPP_SITENAME#" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_IIS_SITE_NAME#,,"WORKFLOW"
:SET &UC4RB_IIS_BINDING_PORT# = GET_VAR(&VARA_NAME_STATIC#,"IIS_WEBAPP_BINDING_PORT#") :PUBLISH &UC4RB_IIS_BINDING_PORT# ,,"WORKFLOW"
:SET &UC4RB_IIS_BINDING_PROTOCOL# = GET_VAR(&VARA_NAME_STATIC#,"IIS_WEBAPP_BINDING_PROTOCOL#") :PUBLISH &UC4RB_IIS_BINDING_PROTOCOL# ,,"WORKFLOW"
:SET &UC4RB_IIS_HOST_HEADER# = &DNS_SITE#.&DNS_DMZ_ZONE# :PUBLISH &UC4RB_IIS_HOST_HEADER# ,,"WORKFLOW" !&DNS_SITE#.&DNS_DCP_ZONE# !&DNS_SITE#.&DNS_DMZ_ZONE#
:PSET &UC4RB_IIS_SITE_IP_ADDRESS# = '*' :PUBLISH &UC4RB_IIS_SITE_IP_ADDRESS# ,,"WORKFLOW" !&DNS_SITE#.&DNS_DCP_ZONE# !&DNS_SITE#.&DNS_DMZ_ZONE#
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

row.pre_process: !!set attribut host :PUT_ATT HOST = '&HOST_SHAREPOINT_1#' ! !set attribut login for OS-Agent :PUT_ATT LOGIN = 'LOGIN.DEFAUT' :SET &CONN_USER# = GET_ATT(USERID)!
